alert.note: Alert for White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 12:12AM CDT until April 12 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR WOODRUFF AND SOUTHEASTERN WHITE COUNTIES... At 1212 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hurricane Lake WMA, or near Augusta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Augusta... Patterson... Hunter... McCrory... Hurricane Lake WMA... Becton... Dixie... Howell... Penrose... McClelland... Gregory... Grays... Pumpkin Bend... Worden... Morton... Hilleman... Wiville... Georgetown... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
